ShortDescription.Value: Adds a buttons to make all or some citizens sick

Publish.LongDescription:
Adds sickness controls, including: * "Make everyone sick" button (in the 'Click 2 Sick' options menu) * Hot key to make selected citizen or building occupants sick * "Heal everyone" button / hotkey to heal selected citizen * "Decrease all health" button / hotkey to decrease selected citizen's health
The buttons that target all citizens are accessible in the 'Click 2 Sick' options menu.
The "make everyone sick" button drastically disrupts the city -- all citizens will seek medical care, and the economy will plummet; be sure to back up your save before using it.
This mod is a precursor to my upcoming "Pandemic" mod, which will add a new health disaster type, and contagious sickness.
